content: materials - 4 4 5 5 6 7 skeins of purl soho s worsted twist 1 100% merino wool each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 565 655 710 820 905 1035 yards required we used the color wheat flour - us 6 4 mm 24-inch circular needles 3 - us 6 32-inch or 40-inch circular needles 4 depending on sweater size - two us 6 double pointed needles 5 - stitch markers 6 - 4 removable stitch markers 7 - a cable stitch holder 8 - stitch holders 9 or scrap yarn gauge 20 stitches and 31 row = 4 inches in reverse stockinette stitch sizes 34½ 37¾ 41 44¼ 47¼ 50½ to fit actual chest circumference 31 33 34 36 37 39 40 42 43 45 47 49 inches with approximately 2 4 inches of ease - finished chest circumference 34½ 37¾ 41 44¼ 47¼ 50½ inches - finished length from top of shoulder 21¼ 22¾ 23¼ 24¾ 25¼ 26¾ inches sample the top pictured here is size 34½ inches modeled with 2½ inches of ease 1 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 7 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 8 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 9 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
